versailles.query: query GetRulersByCastle($castleId: ID!) { getRulersByCastle(castleId: $castleId) { id name title reignStart reignEnd house castleIds description achievements } }

getRulersByCastle.name: Louis XIV
getRulersByCastle.title: The Sun King
getRulersByCastle.description: Known for his absolute monarchy and the construction of the Palace of Versailles. His reign of 72 years is the longest of any European monarch.
achievements: Built the magnificent Palace of Versailles
Established French cultural dominance in Europe

getRulersByCastle.name: Louis XIII
getRulersByCastle.title: The Just
getRulersByCastle.description: Father of Louis XIV, established the foundations of absolute monarchy with Cardinal Richelieu.

fontainebleau.query: query GetRulersByCastle($castleId: ID!) { getRulersByCastle(castleId: $castleId) { id name title reignStart reignEnd house castleIds description achievements } }

getRulersByCastle.name: Fran√ßois I
getRulersByCastle.title: King of France
getRulersByCastle.description: Renaissance monarch who brought Italian Renaissance culture to France and was a great patron of the arts.

getRulersByCastle.name: Philippe Auguste
getRulersByCastle.title: Philip II of France
getRulersByCastle.description: First French king to use the title 'King of France' rather than 'King of the Franks', greatly expanded royal domain.
achievements: Tripled the size of French royal domain
Defeated John of England at Bouvines
